itemLabel: John Morris, Baron Morris of Aberavon

wikipedia_page.main: John Morris, Baron Morris of Aberavon,  (born 5 November 1931) is a British politician. He was a Labour Member of Parliament (MP) from 1959 to 2001, which included a period as Secretary of State for Wales from 1974 to 1979. As of 2021, he is the only living former Labour MP who was first elected in the 1950s. He is also the last surviving member of Harold Wilson's 1974–76 cabinet.

response: *John Morris, Baron Morris of Aberavon, Labour politician
